subject: p15857729
History: -year-old woman with productive cough for four days, low-grade fever, question pneumonia.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest were obtained. There is right middle lobe consolidation involving the medial segment. Otherwise, the lungs are clear. No large pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Cardiomediastinal silhouette appears normal. Bony structures are intact. No free air below the right hemidiaphragm.
Impression: Pneumonia involving the medial segment of the right middle lobe.
